title: 이달의소녀탐구 #498 (LOONA TV #498)
summary:
They are about to start the shoot. Some are nervous, some are cold.
0:05 -- HyunJin: "Aeong~".
0:06 -- ViVi, Hyejoo and Go Won share their opinions about the set.
0:19 -- The shoot begins. In between, they monitor themselves. ViVi: "When I was monitoring, it was so pretty so i want to do better." Hyejoo says that she practiced with the shoes but the ground was quite different.
